title: Drawing, Mars and Juno; Mercury and Diana set in Diagonal Composition, 1815
title_raw: Mars and Juno; Mercury and Diana set in Diagonal Composition
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: segment with front legs of animal and letter B
inscribed: Inscribed: Giunone e Marte; Diana e Mercurio. On verso: camera da letto.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Pair shown seated, goddesses in foreground, gods in middle planes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Mars and Juno; Mercury and Diana set in Diagonal Composition, 1815. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3248
